name: 2 == "SPEED"
description:
2 == "SPEED" is a platformer where the player lives for only 2 seconds, there are multiple checkpoints and power-ups there to assist you.

  • The green cylinders are checkpoints. Get to them as quickly as possible
  • The blue orbs are power-ups that either give you: extra time; increased move speed; increased jump speed;
  • The chequered flag is you key to finish the level.

Music was created by myself.
